Player History
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Montreal to Chicago on 6/24/1985 (Going to CHC: P Norm Charlton, P Mel Rojas. Going to MON: P Lee Smith)...
Earned first career win on 4/3/1988...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $920,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,468,571 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/12/1991, off Fernando Valenzuela (SD)...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,468,571 through salary arbitration...
8/1/1992: Signed a contract extension with Chicago, $3,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
